svg.text: KYC Onboarding Flow — Optimized for Minimal User Input
DigiLocker-first, Aadhaar-forced login, async verification, batch submission
Mobile OTP sent for Aadhaar verification
User logs into DigiLocker with Aadhaar
Consent to fetch: Aadhaar XML + PAN Card doc
Returns: name, DOB, gender, photo, full address,
father's name, PAN details — ALL AUTO-FILLED
Name, DOB, Gender, Father's Name, Address, Photo, PAN
Occupation, Mother's Name — optional, can ask or skip
Bank name, branch auto-populated from IFSC
Upload: Cancelled cheque or bank statement image
Option A: Add nominee (name, relation, DOB, %)
Option B: "I opt out of nomination"
Can add more nominees later from profile settings
☐ I am a tax resident of India only (FATCA — Y/N)
☐ I am NOT a PEP / related to a PEP
☐ I have read Risk Disclosure Document
☐ I authorize quarterly running account settlement
2. Take selfie → face match vs Aadhaar photo
3. Aadhaar OTP e-Sign on complete application
[V6: Digio] Generate PDF → SHA-256 hash → DSC applied
Runs in background job queues. User sees "Application under review" status.
Upload KYC to KRA (3 working days)
BO Setup API → DP ID + Client ID
CLIENT ACTIVE → Ready to Trade (typically within 24-48 hours)
